attributes.action: Review rules into children in school self isolating where COVID case is found
attributes.additional_details: This is extremely disruptive for children who have already missed so much time at school over the last year. Given all of the relaxation to the rules which has already been applied this very rigid approach does not make sense. This needs urgent review!
attributes.background: Current rules require children to self isolate where one COVID case arise in their class. We want parliament to urgently debate these rules to get them changed.
